孋字的基本解释

孋
lí
古同“骊”，古国名。
姓。

孋
lì
美好：“高贤姣孋，富贵显荣。”
古通“俪”，配偶：“祁祁皇孋，言观贞淑。”

孋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》吕支切，平支，來。］
(1)古部族名。参见“孋戎”。
(2)姓。
[②]［lì］
［《集韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
(1)同“麗”。美丽。
(2)通“儷”。配偶。

孋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　孋； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页274第22
【廣韻】呂支切【集韻】【韻會】鄰知切，?音離。戎國名。孋戎，在京兆新豐縣，其君姬姓。【史記·晉世家】獻公所獲孋戎之女曰孋姬。左傳、晉語通作驪。　又姓。漢淮南相孋仲仁。　又【集韻】郞計切，音麗。美也。

孋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
孋字的起名意思

美好，如：“高贤姣～，富贵显荣。”。古同“骊”，古国名。

孋
Basic explanation of words
孋
lí
The ancient same "Li", the name of the ancient country.
name.
孋
lì
Beautiful: "Gao Xianjiao, rich and honorable."
Gu Tong "Li", spouse: "Qi Qi Huangmao, the words are pure and pure."
孋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lu Zhiqie, flat branch, come. ]
(1) Ancient tribe name. See "Yi Rong".
(2) Last name.
[②]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
(1) Same as "Li". beautiful.
(2) Through "Li". spouse.
孋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　孋; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 274 to 22
[Guang Yun] Lv Zhiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Neighbors know and cut,? Sound is separated. Rong country name. Yi Rong, in Xinfeng County, Jingzhao, has the surname of his monarch Ji. 【Historical Records·Jin Family】The daughter of Yirong obtained by Xian Gong is called Yi Ji. Zuo Zhuan and Jin dialect are all used as Li.　Another last name. Han Huainan Xiang Yi Zhongren.　[Jiyun] Yun Jiqie, Yinli. Beauty too.
孋

Name meaning
Beautiful, such as: "Gao Xian Jiao ~, rich and honorable.". The ancient same "Li", the name of the ancient country.

собств.
